r.d: Bindings of the SDL2 (Simple DirectMedia Layer) library for PHP.
r.n: - Add support for window events. (Benoit Viguier) - Add support for the SDL_RenderCopyEx, SDL_RenderDrawLine and SDL_RenderDrawRect functions. (Benoit Viguier) - Fix memory leak in the SDL_RenderCopy function. (Benoit Viguier)
